summary: Interactive romantic-themed Valentine web page (HTML/CSS/JS) with Yes/No prompt, evasive No button on hover, and a meme image/message shown after Yes; designed to run in Chrome on iPad.
architectural_notes: Single-page static HTML/CSS/JS designed for iPad Chrome touch + mouse/trackpad interactions.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Meme-style romantic image with the text “No pen, no paper but you still draw my attention” in the design (valentine-meme.dim_1200x800.png)

existing_features.title: Create a single-page, romantic-themed Valentine prompt UI that asks the user: "Will you be my Valentine?" with two prominent options: "Yes" and "No", using a pink-and-white color scheme and a simple, polished layout suitable for iPad Chrome.

Implement the "No" option as an evasive button that moves away when the user attempts to interact with it (hover on pointer devices and touch/pointer down on iPad), making it effectively impossible to click while remaining visible within the viewport.

When the user clicks "Yes", transition the page to a success state that displays a meme image containing the message: "No pen, no paper but you still draw my attention" (exact wording), with a romantic presentation matching the page theme.
Add the required generated image(s) into the frontend as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and render them in the Yes success state.
